title: Complete Personal Information Form
description: Fill out personal details, emergency contacts, and basic information required for HR records.

title: Submit Tax Documents (W-4, I-9)
description: Provide necessary tax forms and identification documents for payroll processing.

title: Review Employee Handbook
description: Read through company policies, procedures, and code of conduct.

title: Complete Safety Training
description: Attend mandatory workplace safety and emergency procedures training session.

title: Set Up Email Account
description: Configure company email account and set up email client on work devices.

title: Access Company Portal
description: Log into the company intranet and familiarize yourself with available resources.

title: Request Security Badge
description: Visit security office to get employee ID badge and building access card.

title: Complete Compliance Training
description: Finish mandatory compliance training modules covering industry regulations.

title: Meet with Direct Manager
description: Schedule and attend initial meeting with your direct supervisor to discuss role expectations.

title: Team Introduction Session
description: Attend team meeting to meet colleagues and understand team dynamics.
